video.title: Murder, She Wrote
video.synopsis: Charming author Jessica Fletcher encounters cold-blooded murders that she cleverly solves using her intellect and astounding deduction skills.

episodes.synopsis: Retired schoolteacher Jessica Fletcher learns her mystery novel will be published and heads to New York for a publicity tour. She gets her first crack at solving a real crime when a man is murdered at a costume party.
episodes.title: The Murder of Sherlock Holmes: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Jessica learns her novel will be published. She goes to New York for a publicity tour and tries solving her first real crime when a man is murdered.
episodes.title: The Murder of Sherlock Holmes: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Jessica investigates the disappearance of a rich man who drowned in a boating accident. The mystery takes a turn when a local vagrant turns up dead.
episodes.title: Deadly Lady

episodes.synopsis: Jessica attends her niece's wedding, where the bride has cold feet. Jessica is pulled into an investigation involving cheating, nightclubs and murder.
episodes.title: Birds of a Feather

episodes.synopsis: Jessica learns that changes are being made to the film version of her novel. When the film's producer is murdered, Jessica becomes the main suspect.
episodes.title: Hooray for Homicide

episodes.synopsis: Jessica investigates the death of estate owner Denton Langley. Langley wills his entire fortune to his dog, but his family has plans of their own.
episodes.title: It's a Dog's Life

episodes.synopsis: Jessica's secretary is accused of killing a woman. Jessica believes he's innocent, but the investigation takes a turn when another woman is killed.
episodes.title: Lovers and Other Killers

episodes.synopsis: A man is run over by a driverless car, and his associate turns up dead. Jessica wants to uncover the truth when her friend becomes a suspect.
episodes.title: Hit, Run and Homicide

episodes.synopsis: Jessica meets an amusement park owner who wants to adapt her books into a house of horrors attraction. When he's found dead, Jessica investigates.
episodes.title: We're Off to Kill the Wizard

episodes.synopsis: Jessica watches a friend's grandniece perform with a Russian ballet company but tangles with the KGB when two men are accused of killing a guard.
episodes.title: Death Takes a Curtain Call

episodes.synopsis: After hypnotizing reporters, the Amazing Cagliostro is killed. The reporters proclaim their innocence, but Jessica's sure one of them is the killer.
episodes.title: Death Casts a Spell

episodes.synopsis: When a congressman dies, Jessica gets a crash course in the dark side of politics. A secretary is then killed, and Jessica aids in the investigation.
episodes.title: Capitol Offense

episodes.synopsis: When a Broadway musical starring actress Rita Bristol becomes a stage for murder, Jessica sets out to uncover the truth and catch the perpetrator.
episodes.title: Broadway Malady

episodes.synopsis: Jessica's niece Pamela takes a cruise to recuperate from her husband's death. When she starts wondering if her husband is alive, Jessica investigates.
episodes.title: My Johnny Lies Over the Ocean

episodes.synopsis: On a Mediterranean island retreat, someone attempts to kill artist Diego Santana. Jessica struggles to sift the truth from a set of conspicuous clues.
episodes.title: Paint Me a Murder

episodes.synopsis: When private eye Archie Miles is killed, Jessica joins Archie's partner in solving the case, leading to a lasting friendship between the two sleuths.
episodes.title: Tough Guys Don't Die

episodes.synopsis: Jessica becomes part owner of a professional football team. When the team's owner is killed, the writer turned sleuth sets out to catch the killer.
episodes.title: Sudden Death

episodes.synopsis: At a literary convention, an author is killed and his manuscript is stolen. Jessica must sort through the suspects, including one of her friends.
episodes.title: Footnote to Murder

episodes.synopsis: When a bus passenger who was recently released from prison is murdered, Jessica must determine the killer from a long list of suspects.
episodes.title: Murder Takes the Bus

episodes.synopsis: Jessica travels to her college reunion and winds up investigating the murder of her former roommate's ex-husband, a star with plenty of enemies.
episodes.title: Murder at the Oasis

episodes.synopsis: A man who inherited a rancher's estate is found dead. The police rule the man's death a suicide, but Jessica believes it was murder and investigates.
episodes.title: Funeral at Fifty-Mile

episodes.synopsis: Jessica goes undercover at a resort to investigate the murder of a friend and uncovers a complicated scam involving a con artist and an heiress.
episodes.title: Widow, Weep for Me

episodes.synopsis: New hotel construction workers uncover a skeleton. Jessica gets involved and discovers a second corpse -- the hotel magnate behind the project.
episodes.title: Joshua Peabody Died Here... Possibly

episodes.synopsis: Jessica's soap opera star niece's character is the show's mysterious serial killer. When the head writer is murdered, she becomes the prime suspect.
episodes.title: Murder in the Afternoon

episodes.synopsis: A famous writer's boyfriend is murdered, and both the writer and her mother confess to the crime. But Jessica realizes that neither can be the killer.
episodes.title: School for Scandal

episodes.synopsis: Jessica is shocked when her cousin passes away. But she soon discovers that Emma is alive and has gone into hiding after receiving a death threat.
episodes.title: Sing a Song of Murder

episodes.synopsis: Jessica's friend claims she's being haunted by her first husband's ghost. When her second husband is murdered, Jessica wonders if he's really dead.
episodes.title: Reflections of the Mind

episodes.synopsis: Jessica sees a woman falls into the water and drown. When Jessica learns the victim was a champion swimmer, she thinks there may be more to the case.
episodes.title: A Lady in the Lake

episodes.synopsis: When the owner of a winning horse is murdered, Jessica's niece is the prime suspect. Can Jessica prove her niece is innocent and find the real killer?
episodes.title: Dead Heat

episodes.synopsis: At a women's prison, Jessica is taken hostage after the doctor is murdered. As she investigates, Jessica uncovers a conspiracy inside the prison.
episodes.title: Jessica Behind Bars

episodes.synopsis: As Jessica investigates the death of Beverly Gareth and poison pen letters sent to residents, she discovers a connection to a real estate deal.
episodes.title: Sticks & Stones

episodes.synopsis: When a corpse is discovered at the site of an archeological dig, Jessica looks into the case and realizes that someone may not approve of the project.
episodes.title: Murder Digs Deep

episodes.synopsis: Jessica investigates the murder of a former student, leading her to the company where her nephew works and landing her in the middle of a family feud.
episodes.title: Murder by Appointment Only

episodes.synopsis: Jessica is the jury foreperson at the trial of a man who claims he killed in self-defense. Jessica uncovers a second murder that bears investigation.
episodes.title: Trial by Error

episodes.synopsis: Several people get sick and one woman dies after eating strawberry preserves at a local restaurant, and Cabot Cove's residents try to pass the blame.
episodes.title: Keep Home Fries Burning

episodes.synopsis: Jessica gets involved in a murder case when a singer is accused of killing his girlfriend's brother. Jessica thinks the case isn't so cut-and-dry.
episodes.title: Powder Keg

episodes.synopsis: When a friend is killed, leaving her fortune to a religious leader, Jessica soon finds that the evangelist's family knows something about the case.
episodes.title: Murder in the Electric Cathedral

episodes.synopsis: A high-stakes auction turns deadly, and Jessica turns to old friend Harry McGraw to help her determine which potential buyer might resort to murder.
episodes.title: One Good Bid Deserves a Murder

episodes.synopsis: Guests at a funeral are surprised when the coffin contains someone else's body. Jessica learns that most of the town's money has disappeared.
episodes.title: If a Body Meet a Body

episodes.synopsis: When a publisher is murdered, Jessica must prove the innocence of an old friend. But her investigation is hampered by the victim's relatives.
episodes.title: Christopher Bundy: Died on Sunday

episodes.synopsis: A star tennis player's car explodes and kills her boyfriend. Jessica promises to prove the athlete's innocence when she becomes the prime suspect.
episodes.title: Menace, Anyone?

episodes.synopsis: Jessica must prove her cousin's innocence when he's accused of murder. Soon, she's exploring the world of gamblers as she hunts for the real killer.
episodes.title: The Perfect Foil

episodes.synopsis: When an art collector is killed and her husband is accused of the crime, Jessica's investigation reveals that two criminals are at work.
episodes.title: If the Frame Fits

episodes.synopsis: Jessica's great-niece's grandfather works at a circus, and Jessica is alarmed to discover he's the prime suspect in a murder under the big top.
episodes.title: Death Stalks the Big Top: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Neil confesses to the murder at the circus when another takes place. Jessica's investigation leads to a rival circus and some stonewalling performers.
episodes.title: Death Stalks the Big Top: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: A retired cop decides to investigate an old case and gathers all the suspects. Once everyone's at the scene of the crime, another murder takes place.
episodes.title: Unfinished Business

episodes.synopsis: Jessica takes a trip to Washington, D.C., for a concert that serves as the setting for the defection of two East Germans and an unexplained murder.
episodes.title: One White Rose for Death

episodes.synopsis: Even Jessica must admit that there was an unsettling motive when her niece is implicated in the murder of her boss, a sleazy advertising executive.
episodes.title: Corned Beef and Carnage

episodes.synopsis: When a diver is murdered searching for sunken treasure, Jessica's friend is suspected. But the man's past makes it tough for her to clear his name.
episodes.title: Dead Man's Gold

episodes.synopsis: When a reporter has a heart attack, he speaks out against his publisher. After the publisher is murdered, Jessica believes the reporter is innocent.
episodes.title: Deadline for Murder

episodes.synopsis: In the conclusion to a story begun on an episode of "Magnum, P.I.," Jessica helps Thomas Magnum prove his innocence in the murder of a hit man.
episodes.title: Magnum on Ice

episodes.synopsis: Jessica's television interview for a friend is railroaded by a reporter. When he's killed, the town blames Jessica and demands she solve the mystery.
episodes.title: Obituary for a Dead Anchor

episodes.synopsis: A leading lady's understudy is murdered, and Jessica's investigation leads her to a pair of feuding co-stars who were once married.
episodes.title: Stage Struck

episodes.synopsis: Jessica must clear the name of her friend, Dorian Beecher, when he's accused of murdering a rival for the affections of a young woman.
episodes.title: Night of the Headless Horseman

episodes.synopsis: A courier is murdered on a London-bound jet, and Jessica has her hands full as the number of potential suspects starts to grow.
episodes.title: The Corpse Flew First Class

episodes.synopsis: A storm strikes Cabot Cove, crossing the telephone wires. When Jessica hears a sinister conversation, no one in town will believe her story.
episodes.title: Crossed Up

episodes.synopsis: A young college student and composer is the prime suspect when a professor he accused of plagiarism is found murdered. Shaun Cassidy guest stars.
episodes.title: Murder in a Minor Key

episodes.synopsis: A dishonest consumer advocate is murdered, and the evidence points to Jessica's friend whose product was the victim of a negative review.
episodes.title: Bottom Line is Murder

episodes.synopsis: Harry McGraw reenters Jessica's life, asking her to manage a boxer. Jessica agrees and ends up having to clear Harry's name in a murder case.
episodes.title: Death Takes a Dive

episodes.synopsis: Jessica investigates the murder of an artist and the disappearance of one of his treasured paintings.
episodes.title: Simon Says, Color Me Dead

episodes.synopsis: When a murder takes place at an engagement party for Kip, Jessica investigates while trying to ignore Kip's feuding parents, both stand-up comedians.
episodes.title: No Laughing Murder

episodes.synopsis: Jessica tries to clear her nephew Grady's name when he's implicated in the murder of his boss, a prominent accountant.
episodes.title: No Accounting for Murder

episodes.synopsis: Cabot Cove's progressive mayor is murdered, and Jessica has just begun her search for the killer when the mayor's father is also found dead.
episodes.title: The Cemetery Vote

episodes.synopsis: When a convicted murderer is released from prison, the victim's wife asks Jessica to look into the case. Jessica wants to prove he wasn't the killer.
episodes.title: The Days Dwindle Down

episodes.synopsis: Jessica travels to Paris, where a financially desperate fashion designer is fingered in the murder of a loan shark.
episodes.title: A Fashionable Way to Die

episodes.synopsis: A recently paroled convict arrives in Cabot Cove intent on proving he didn't commit the murder that sent him to prison two decades ago.
episodes.title: When Thieves Fall Out

episodes.synopsis: When a friend of Jessica's is accused of killing his wife and burning down his house to cover up the crime, Jessica goes to testify on his behalf.
episodes.title: Witness for the Defense

episodes.synopsis: When a terminally ill nun dies in an apparent suicide, Jessica investigates based on her doubt that the woman would have committed a cardinal sin.
episodes.title: Old Habits Die Hard

episodes.synopsis: Jessica becomes involved in corporate intrigue when a prominent business leader dies in a mysterious accident.
episodes.title: The Way to Dusty Death

episodes.synopsis: When a deputy's wife is murdered, Jessica and Amos discover more than a few skeletons in the man's closet, all involving the town's lonely women.
episodes.title: If It's Thursday, It Must Be Beverly

episodes.synopsis: Jessica confronts a TV producer who is using one of her novels for a TV show, and Jessica becomes the prime suspect when he's found murdered.
episodes.title: Steal Me a Story

episodes.synopsis: Jessica runs up against some unfriendly locals when she travels to a town posing as a woman's friend to investigate the murder of the woman's sister.
episodes.title: Trouble in Eden

episodes.synopsis: A resident speaks out against a Native American who claims to own the town. The Native American is then implicated when the resident is murdered.
episodes.title: Indian Giver

episodes.synopsis: Jessica's nephew Grady is suspected in the murder of an old girlfriend who was having an affair with Grady's married former fraternity brother.
episodes.title: Doom with a View

episodes.synopsis: When Elmo follows Amos's sister to Cabot Cove and dies during dinner at Jessica's house, Amos must deal with the apparent murder and Elmo's family.
episodes.title: Who Threw the Barbitals in Mrs. Fletcher's Chowder?

episodes.synopsis: During the return of a comet believed to be a bad omen, Jessica's niece, Carrie, has a former boyfriend turn up dead in her home.
episodes.title: Harbinger of Death

episodes.synopsis: Jessica investigates mysterious events involving a valuable ruby and an ancient curse on Seth's family.
episodes.title: Curse of the Daanav

episodes.synopsis: Playwright Eugene McClendon, believing he's dying, proposes to Jessica. She agrees, but only long enough to clear Eugene of his manager's murder.
episodes.title: Mourning Among the Wisterias

episodes.synopsis: Jessica overhears the last words of a wounded hit man. Soon, she's involved with the government, a police sergeant and a man claiming to be a priest.
episodes.title: Murder Through the Looking Glass

episodes.synopsis: Jessica investigates a murder that took place at a family birthday party for an aging vineyard owner.
episodes.title: A Very Good Year for Murder

episodes.synopsis: Jessica inherits a ramshackle Cabot Cove house that was once frequented by Benedict Arnold and is reputed to harbor hidden treasure.
episodes.title: Benedict Arnold Slipped Here

episodes.synopsis: Jessica travels to New York to celebrate her nephew's engagement and ends up investigating the murder of a restaurant's maitre d'.
episodes.title: Just Another Fish Story

episodes.synopsis: Jessica's niece Jill has a crush on a rodeo star and enlists Jessica's help when the man is charged with murder. Kristy McNichol guest stars.
episodes.title: Showdown in Saskatchewan

episodes.synopsis: After one of Jessica's novels is adapted for the Broadway stage, an escalating feud between two theatre critics ends in murder.
episodes.title: Deadpan

episodes.synopsis: While writing speeches for a friend running for Senate, Jessica winds up trying to exonerate the woman of her campaign manager's murder.
episodes.title: The Body Politic

episodes.synopsis: After witnessing a murder, Jessica is the prime suspect. With Jessica unable to clear her own name, Hagarty and Grady try to find the real killer.
episodes.title: J.B. as in Jailbird

episodes.synopsis: A Senate candidate is murdered in a hotel room directly above Jessica's, and a busboy is arrested for the murder. Jessica thinks they have wrong man.
episodes.title: A Little Night Work

episodes.synopsis: When the corpse of Morris Penroy turns up on the front lawn of two spinster sisters, Jessica tries to prove that the old ladies weren't responsible.
episodes.title: Mr. Penroy's Vacation

episodes.synopsis: Jessica is involved in a murder case when a skier is killed. A blizzard traps the suspects indoors, and it's up to Jessica to identify the culprit.
episodes.title: Snow White, Blood Red

episodes.synopsis: After businessman Tyler Morgan is murdered, the murder weapon is found with Jessica's former student. Jessica tries to prove her innocence.
episodes.title: Coal Miner's Slaughter

episodes.synopsis: Jessica gets caught in the middle of a robbery and murder. To find the missing jewelry, Jessica must put up with two annoying female detectives.
episodes.title: Wearing of the Green

episodes.synopsis: When a military plane resurfaces, Jessica's deceased husband Frank is labeled as a suspect in a murder. Jessica tracks down Frank's military buddies.
episodes.title: The Last Flight of the Dixie Damsel

episodes.synopsis: Jessica is entertained by a psychic who predicts impending doom. Kidnapping and murder ensue, forcing Jessica to help determine who's responsible.
episodes.title: Prediction: Murder

episodes.synopsis: Just prior to the wedding of Jessica's nephew, a maid is found murdered. If Jessica can't find the killer in time, the wedding could be canceled.
episodes.title: Something Borrowed, Someone Blue

episodes.synopsis: A prominent female resident of Cabot Cove is arrested for murder, and Jessica soon discovers that the accused woman has two husbands.
episodes.title: Weave a Tangled Web

episodes.synopsis: When a friend dies, Jessica attends her funeral and searches for the woman's missing son. However, looking for him leads Jessica to more mysteries.
episodes.title: The Search for Peter Kerry

episodes.synopsis: When residents claim to have seen the ghost of a Pilgrim woman, Jessica wonders if the sightings have something to do with a possible murder.
episodes.title: Fire Burn, Cauldron Bubble

episodes.synopsis: Jessica travels to Moscow and gets into trouble with the authorities, who find evidence in her purse and conclude that she's an American spy.
episodes.title: From Russia... with Blood

episodes.synopsis: An English professor is found at the scene of a murder and confesses to the crime. Doubting the professor's guilt, Jessica searches for the truth.
episodes.title: Alma Murder

episodes.synopsis: Jessica is forced to spend time at a truck stop. When a murder takes place there, Jessica doesn't back down from bringing the killer to justice.
episodes.title: Truck Stop

episodes.synopsis: A new book reveals the secrets of Cabot Cove. When a murder in the book takes place in real life, Jessica must determine which clues are real.
episodes.title: The Sins of Castle Cove

episodes.synopsis: Jessica recommends a young writer to edit the manuscripts of famous author Trevor Hudson. When the writer turns up dead, Jessica must discover why.
episodes.title: Trevor Hudson's Legacy

episodes.synopsis: Jessica runs into her old neighbor, but he denies knowing her. When the man's wife claims her husband is dead, Jessica tries to solve the mystery.
episodes.title: Double Exposure

episodes.synopsis: When Jessica visits her baseball-player nephew, a newswoman is murdered. Her nephew's friend is accused, but Jessica believes he's innocent.
episodes.title: Three Strikes, You're Out

episodes.synopsis: Upset that her publisher has favored Jessica over her, a fading mystery writer travels to Cabot Cove seeking revenge on an unsuspecting Jessica.
episodes.title: Mirror, Mirror, On the Wall: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: An investigator following mystery writer Eudora McVeigh turns up dead. Eudora claims she's innocent but has a hard time convincing Jessica.
episodes.title: Mirror, Mirror, On the Wall: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: When Jessica travels to Greece, she runs into an old friend, MI6 Agent Michael Hagarty, who convinces her to help rescue an agent from his abductors.
episodes.title: Appointment in Athens

episodes.synopsis: After a parishioner confesses to a priest about a killing, the priest seeks Jessica's help to exonerate an innocent man without violating his oath.
episodes.title: Seal of the Confessional

episodes.synopsis: When a legendary writer dies, Jessica reminisces about a 1947 case in which the writer helped investigate the murder of a former Nazi officer.
episodes.title: The Grand Old Lady

episodes.synopsis: When a land developer's wife is a suspect in the man's murder, she commits suicide. While investigating, Jessica discovers many clients with motives.
episodes.title: The Error of Her Ways

episodes.synopsis: While an ex-football star turned sleuth takes care of his friend's poodle, the friend is murdered. Solving the case may require the dog's help.
episodes.title: Jack and Bill

episodes.synopsis: When a fireman dies in a furniture store fire the day Jessica gives him an old letter she finds in an antique bureau, his death seems suspicious.
episodes.title: Dead Letter

episodes.synopsis: While Jessica is visiting Jamaica, a voodoo death curse is apparently triggered after the heir to a plantation doesn't make the right marriage.
episodes.title: Night of the Tarantula

episodes.synopsis: In San Francisco, an opera star confesses to murdering his co-star's boyfriend in self-defense. But Jessica thinks there's more to the story.
episodes.title: When the Fat Lady Sings

episodes.synopsis: When a man asks Jessica to come to his island to discover which of his family members is trying to kill him, he turns up dead before she arrives.
episodes.title: Test of Wills

episodes.synopsis: An ex-Los Angeles detective turned criminology professor teams up with his students to try to solve the case that got him pushed off the force.
episodes.title: Class Act

episodes.synopsis: During a speech by Cabot Cove's unmarried mayor, a woman confronts him claiming he's the father of her five children, which shocks the residents.
episodes.title: Town Father

episodes.synopsis: When a body is found on the railroad tracks, three groups of people claim the deceased is their relative. Bill Maher and Bryan Cranston guest star.
episodes.title: Good-Bye Charlie

episodes.synopsis: A single mother and factory worker becomes a suspect in the murder of her unpleasant landlord, who constantly made her life difficult.
episodes.title: If the Shoe Fits

episodes.synopsis: Novice investor Jessica learns more than she wanted to know about the brutal high-finance biz when her stockbroker is murdered.
episodes.title: How to Make a Killing Without Really Trying

episodes.synopsis: When Jessica's niece, a real estate broker, arrives at a pricey house to meet a buyer, she finds a corpse. Chad Everett and Genie Francis guest star.
episodes.title: The Fixer-Upper

episodes.synopsis: A variety-show host troubled by an enigmatic woman dressed in black asks Jessica to investigate a murder on the set that occurred 25 years ago.
episodes.title: The Big Show of 1965

episodes.synopsis: When a television programmer is murdered just before canceling a police drama, the producer of the series investigates the case.
episodes.title: Murder--According to Maggie

episodes.synopsis: A stubborn Irish detective doesn't believe that a real estate mogul's death was a suicide. Pat Hingle guest stars as Lt. James O'Malley.
episodes.title: O'Malley's Luck

episodes.synopsis: Jessica's friend Dennis, a thief turned insurance investigator, looks into a double murder and robbery that took place in the upper crust of society.
episodes.title: Always a Thief

episodes.synopsis: When the fiancé of Jessica's cousin Ann is murdered and evidence points to Ann's brother, Jessica works to prove he's innocent.
episodes.title: Shear Madness

episodes.synopsis: While Grady and his pregnant wife, Donna, house-sit for Jessica, they find an enigmatic seaman murdered in her living room.
episodes.title: The Szechuan Dragon

episodes.synopsis: Jessica's old friend Michael Hagarty, an MI6 agent, goes undercover as a monsignor in Sicily to solve a complicated case involving the Mafia.
episodes.title: The Sicilian Encounter

episodes.synopsis: Jessica is sued by the daughter of a man she put behind bars. When he dies during a botched escape, Jessica must prove his guilt a second time.
episodes.title: Trials and Tribulations

episodes.synopsis: Sidelined with a broken arm, Jessica hires a typist. When the typist's husband is killed, Jessica takes the lead in another murder investigation.
episodes.title: Deadly Misunderstanding

episodes.synopsis: When Truman Calloway is murdered, Dennis Stanton, an insurance investigator, weeds through a long list of the victim's enemies to identify the killer.
episodes.title: See You in Court, Baby

episodes.synopsis: An author dies before he can complete his exposé about an old murder case. Jessica must prove the author's theory that the wrong man was convicted.
episodes.title: Hannigan's Wake

episodes.synopsis: Jessica's friend is accused of jewel theft and murder, setting off an investigation that involves affairs, a lusty chauffeur and a mystery lover.
episodes.title: The Family Jewels

episodes.synopsis: Jessica sets out to prove the innocence of her friend Eve, who stands accused of killing a con artist with close ties to the Cabot Cove gym owner.
episodes.title: A Body to Die For

episodes.synopsis: Preston Giles is paroled from prison. Giles's nemesis is found dead, and Jessica tries to find out if someone is trying to frame her former publisher.
episodes.title: The Return of Preston Giles

episodes.synopsis: A shady character from the past shows up and pulls Stanton into a murder investigation involving an original Mark Twain manuscript.
episodes.title: The Great Twain Robbery

episodes.synopsis: Jessica visits her friends Bobby and Patti in Nashville, but the reunion turns into a murder investigation when someone poisons them both.
episodes.title: Ballad for a Blue Lady

episodes.synopsis: Lt. Catalano joins detective Dennis Stanton and his assistant in a murder investigation involving pianist Vaclav Maryska and his wife, Milena.
episodes.title: Murder in F Sharp

episodes.synopsis: After witnessing a mob hit, Jessica and Seth are taken by a mobster who blames Seth for his father's death. Jessica must find the real killer.
episodes.title: Family Doctor

episodes.synopsis: Stanton becomes a suspect when his ex-girlfriend's husband is killed, piquing the interest of Lt. Catalano, who wants the investigator behind bars.
episodes.title: Suspicion of Murder

episodes.synopsis: Sheriff Metzger refuses to break the rules for an influential ambassador. When Metzger is accused of murder, Jessica sets out to uncover the truth.
episodes.title: Moving Violation

episodes.synopsis: Jessica investigates the death of a fan who was on the verge of uncovering a dog show scandal. Jessica is certain the clues will lead to murder.
episodes.title: Who Killed J.B. Fletcher?

episodes.synopsis: When a St. Louis pie maker is accused of tax evasion and killing her ex-husband, Jessica tries to prove that her good friend isn't guilty of murder.
episodes.title: The Taxman Cometh

episodes.synopsis: Jessica and Harry investigate the murder of horse owner Randolph Sterling. Clues lead Harry and Jessica to a bloody feud involving horse breeding.
episodes.title: From the Horse's Mouth

episodes.synopsis: Robber Ned Jinks shows up to see his daughter after 20 years. When Ned is accused of killing his old enemy, Jessica jumps in to prove his innocence.
episodes.title: The Prodigal Father

episodes.synopsis: Stanton is called in to investigate the death of a comedy club owner whose body was discovered in a locked room along with a ventriloquist's dummy.
episodes.title: Where Have You Gone, Billy Boy?

episodes.synopsis: Nancy delivers the news that Jessica's late husband is Nancy's son. Steve is facing murder charges, and Nancy enlists Jessica to prove his innocence.
episodes.title: Thursday's Child

episodes.synopsis: In Amish country, Jessica is drawn into the murder of a local farmer. Clues lead to an outsider, as well as the farmer's widow and mistress.
episodes.title: Murder, Plain and Simple

episodes.synopsis: Jessica helps a diner owner when three of her customers die from poisoning. Locals believe that Jessica's meddling helped her get away with murder.
episodes.title: Tainted Lady

episodes.synopsis: Jessica and Harry investigate the murder of a writer who was working on an exposé so scandalous it could destroy a family and their brewery business.
episodes.title: The Skinny According to Nick Cullhane

episodes.synopsis: Jessica moves to New York to teach a criminology class. When someone ransacks her place, Jessica turns to Dr. Seth Hazlitt for help.
episodes.title: Bite the Big Apple

episodes.synopsis: Prof. Wallace Evans bets Jessica that she can't identify a serial mugger before he does. When the robber turns to murder, Jessica suspects Evans.
episodes.title: Night Fears

episodes.synopsis: Jessica investigates the death of a journalist, Jane Dawson, who was planning to publish an unauthorized biography about film legend Ellen Lombard.
episodes.title: Unauthorized Obituary

episodes.synopsis: Jessica takes the lead in an investigation involving Sheriff Metzger's brother, who's accused of killing his boss after being released from prison.
episodes.title: Thicker Than Water

episodes.synopsis: Jessica signs up for a computer class. During her coursework, she uncovers in one of the school's computers a hacker's trail leading to murder.
episodes.title: Lines of Excellence

episodes.synopsis: Jessica attends the funeral of a musician and is pulled into two murder investigations when a bass player is killed and a cold case is revived.
episodes.title: Judge Not

episodes.synopsis: Setting out to prove the innocence of a battered wife who's accused of killing her abusive husband, Jessica investigates the man's list of enemies.
episodes.title: Terminal Connection

episodes.synopsis: Jessica investigates the murder of a casino manager and risks her own life in order to prove the innocence of Susan Hartley's boyfriend.
episodes.title: A Killing in Vegas

episodes.synopsis: Jessica is asked to investigate the murder of an exclusive men's association member. Clues point to a club leader, making Jessica's job difficult.
episodes.title: The Committee

episodes.synopsis: Jessica gets caught up in a dangerous operation involving top secret documents when she discovers a dead KGB agent in her ransacked hotel room.
episodes.title: The List of Yuri Lermentov

episodes.synopsis: When three ballerinas die, Jessica sets out to prove that the ballet isn't cursed, but that someone is using the production as a stage for murder.
episodes.title: Danse Diabolique

episodes.synopsis: When strange things happen during a play about a witch, locals believe that the outsider hired to portray the woman is the witch's reincarnation.
episodes.title: The Witch's Curse

episodes.synopsis: Jessica is pulled into a real-life murder mystery when she tours Universal Studios and discovers a dead producer in the Bates Motel.
episodes.title: Incident in Lot #7

episodes.synopsis: Jessica visits a friend, but when a businessman is murdered and a diamond is stolen, inspector Charles Morel joins Jessica in the hunt for the killer.
episodes.title: The Monte Carlo Murders

episodes.synopsis: Jessica finds a corpse in her London hotel room. But the body vanishes before authorities arrive, so the plucky writer launches her own investigation.
episodes.title: Tinker, Tailor, Liar, Thief

episodes.synopsis: When a soap opera star is accused of killing her husband, Jessica initiates an investigation that leads to an actor who was fired from the serial.
episodes.title: Ever After

episodes.synopsis: Jessica helps Sean Culhane when he's accused of killing his longtime enemy. Culhane was overheard threatening him, but Jessica believes he's innocent.
episodes.title: To the Last Will I Grapple with Thee

episodes.synopsis: One of Seth's patients dies. Convinced there's more to the guru's death than meets the eye, Jessica sets out to prove that her friend is innocent.
episodes.title: Programmed for Murder

episodes.synopsis: Jessica investigates a murder in which the victim was found wearing the Mask of Montezuma -- an artifact stolen from the National Museum of Mexico.
episodes.title: Day of the Dead

episodes.synopsis: Jessica attempts to cheer up her friend after his wife's suicide. When death strikes the family again, Jessica is asked to don her ghost-hunting hat.
episodes.title: Angel of Death

episodes.synopsis: Seth's former army buddy arrives, but the reunion takes a serious turn when Ben is accused of killing his boss. Jessica uncovers Ben's secrets.
episodes.title: Badge of Honor

episodes.synopsis: The vice president of the company creating Jessica's board game is killed. The murder parallels the game, and Jessica must make the right moves.
episodes.title: Murder on Madison Avenue

episodes.synopsis: At the Milan Film Festival premiere of a film adapted from one of her novels, Jessica stumbles onto murder when the film's producer is killed.
episodes.title: Murder in Milan

episodes.synopsis: One of Jessica's former students returns to write a book revealing new information on a scandal involving two of the town's founding families.
episodes.title: Family Secrets

episodes.synopsis: Thugs mistake Jessica for another woman. When that woman turns up dead, the police refuse to believe Jessica when she implicates a Cabot Cove bigwig.
episodes.title: The Mole

episodes.synopsis: In Ireland, when her host drops dead, Jessica is convinced it's not due to natural causes, and the clues lead back to a legend involving a ghost.
episodes.title: The Wind Around the Tower

episodes.synopsis: Jessica is threatened with a lawsuit after a comic strip depicts her accusing some of the Big Apple's biggest names of committing crimes.
episodes.title: The Dead File

episodes.synopsis: A stagecoach robber's buried treasure is linked to a modern-day murder, and Jessica needs the sheriff's help to find the key to both mysteries.
episodes.title: Night of the Coyote

episodes.synopsis: Jessica's old pal investigates his daughter's fiancé and ends up accused of the man's murder. Jessica is determined to find the real killer.
episodes.title: Sugar & Spice, Malice & Vice

episodes.synopsis: When the oil-rich daddy of Jessica's longtime editor disappears, the psychic who's pronounced the missing man murdered turns up dead herself.
episodes.title: The Classic Murder

episodes.synopsis: A Gulf War veteran returns to his fiancée, bringing with him a dark secret. When trouble erupts, Jessica investigates an embezzlement scheme.
episodes.title: A Christmas Secret

episodes.synopsis: Jessica finds herself at the taping of a rock video after recording an audio book. When the producer dies mid-shoot, she sets off to find the culprit.
episodes.title: The Sound of Murder

episodes.synopsis: A retired actor returns to the stage to helm the Cabot Cove production of an Off Broadway-bound play. When his manager dies, Jessica snoops around.
episodes.title: Final Curtain

episodes.synopsis: Jessica fears she may have unwittingly helped a murderer after teaching a writing class at the church during which she discussed poisons.
episodes.title: Double Jeopardy

episodes.synopsis: What do the Kennedy assassination, the 1963 disappearance of a private eye and a recent murder have in common? Jessica is determined to find out.
episodes.title: Dead Eye

episodes.synopsis: A radio station's prospective owner is killed before the sale of the station can go through. Jessica is soon hot on the killer's trail.
episodes.title: Killer Radio

episodes.synopsis: When a Beverly Hills florist ends up dead, Jessica suspects it's because he was digging up dirt for more than just flower beds.
episodes.title: The Petrified Florist

episodes.synopsis: Jessica helps a woman tormented by her mother's murder when the killer attempts to make contact. A psychiatrist and stepbrother complicate matters.
episodes.title: Threshold of Fear

episodes.synopsis: A fisherman and a banker are both victims of carbon monoxide poisoning. Now, it's Jessica's job to find the link between the two men.
episodes.title: The Big Kill

episodes.synopsis: When Jessica's former researcher is charged with murder, she doesn't hesitate to assist her. But it would help if the woman weren't a compulsive liar.
episodes.title: Dead to Rights

episodes.synopsis: When a local delivery boy Jessica's befriended becomes a witness and then the prime suspect in a murder, she has no choice but to get involved.
episodes.title: Lone Witness

episodes.synopsis: It's hard dating a cop -- especially when he ends up dead. Jessica's tech person is accused of killing a policeman, and Jessica must find the killer.
episodes.title: The Survivor

episodes.synopsis: When a novelist's assistant dies, Jessica wonders if the writer was the intended victim, since her husband was having an affair with the woman.
episodes.title: Love's Deadly Desire

episodes.synopsis: In Hong Kong, Jessica's wealthy host, Brian, is murdered. Jessica tries to determine whether his death was related to an impending business merger.
episodes.title: A Death in Hong Kong

episodes.synopsis: A developer who wants to tear down a brownstone where Ernest Hemingway once lived is found murdered, and Jessica's friend is accused of the crime.
episodes.title: For Whom the Ball Tolls

episodes.synopsis: After moving into a mansion, Lawrence Baker is found dead with a stake through his chest. Some residents believe he's a vampire, but Jessica doesn't.
episodes.title: The Legacy of Borbey House

episodes.synopsis: When Ben, a reporter, is accused of killing his rival, Jessica does some digging and is surprised to discover that Ben hasn't been honest with her.
episodes.title: The Phantom Killer

episodes.synopsis: Jessica agrees to pen a script for a video game. But when the designer is accused of murder, Jessica must turn to the virtual world for assistance.
episodes.title: A Virtual Murder

episodes.synopsis: A race-horse trainer has information about a horse, but he dies in an accident before he can say anything. Jessica wants to know who wanted him dead.
episodes.title: Bloodlines

episodes.synopsis: In Ireland, Jessica's friend's family is in a dispute over a wool factory. When a cousin is murdered, Jessica helps the Irish police solve the crime.
episodes.title: A Killing in Cork

episodes.synopsis: Deputy Loomis pays for his evil deeds with his life. Jessica's accountant is discovered with a recently fired gun and is charged with the murder.
episodes.title: Love and Hate in Cabot Cove

episodes.synopsis: A man acquitted of killing his wife sues Jessica because her book resembles his experience. But he's murdered before he can tell anyone his story.
episodes.title: Murder at a Discount

episodes.synopsis: Jessica works on a stage adaptation of one of her mysteries. While the actors worry about their performances, the show's producer is stabbed to death.
episodes.title: Murder in White

episodes.synopsis: Jessica is in a Canadian town where a battle rages between a mining company and a group of Indians. Two separate murders draw Jessica's attention.
episodes.title: Northern Explosion

episodes.synopsis: Jessica's chef friend invites her to watch his cooking show. Jessica is baffled when the chef is murdered and his ties with the mob are revealed.
episodes.title: Proof in the Pudding

episodes.synopsis: Artist Kim Mitchell doesn't get along with gallery owner Philip Jovet. When someone murders Jovet using one of Kim's sculptures, Jessica investigates.
episodes.title: Portrait of Death

episodes.synopsis: After losing $900,000 to a thief, a mobster sends a hit man to take him out. When the hit man winds up dead, Jessica's friend is accused of the crime.
episodes.title: Deadly Assets

episodes.synopsis: When Jessica's editor kills himself by jumping from his Manhattan office window, Jessica suspects foul play and searches for the real reason he died.
episodes.title: Murder on the Thirtieth Floor

episodes.synopsis: One of Jessica's students is accused of killing his stepfather. A photo at the crime scene seems to confirm his guilt, but Jessica's not convinced.
episodes.title: Time to Die

episodes.synopsis: When Floyd Larkin's company is acquired in a takeover, Jessica investigates the death of the accountant responsible for putting the deal together.
episodes.title: The Dying Game

episodes.synopsis: When Seth Hazlitt's office is ransacked, everyone fears the worst. Jessica discovers that the key to unlocking this mystery can be found in the past.
episodes.title: The Trouble with Seth

episodes.synopsis: A truck driver is robbed of computers destined for NASA. When his son is accused of murder, Jessica tries to find the connection between the crimes.
episodes.title: Roadkill

episodes.synopsis: Piano teacher Byron Tokofsky forms a relationship with his protégée, Leslie. After Leslie's father comes back into her life, Byron is found murdered.
episodes.title: A Murderous Muse

episodes.synopsis: Jessica checks up on employees of a traveling carnival to see whether they might have motives for stealing -- or for killing the carnival's owner.
episodes.title: Wheel of Death

episodes.synopsis: Jessica gets involved in a case at the zoo. It seems the fiancé of one of the zoo employees was killed by someone using a poisonous black mamba snake.
episodes.title: A Nest of Vipers

episodes.synopsis: While visiting Amsterdam, Jessica's friend goes missing. Jessica investigates her friend's disappearance and stumbles across a smuggling operation.
episodes.title: Amsterdam Kill

episodes.synopsis: When a letter written by George Washington surfaces, a documentary about his life hangs in the balance -- resulting in the murder of the director.
episodes.title: To Kill a Legend

episodes.synopsis: When Jessica's host's son becomes ensnared in a vicious Senate election campaign and disappears days before the election, Jessica suspects foul play.
episodes.title: Death in Hawaii

episodes.synopsis: Coming up with cliffhangers for her novel takes a backseat when one of Jessica's colleagues finds herself in the crosshairs of a deadly gunman.
episodes.title: Dear Deadly

episodes.synopsis: When Jessica's friend's television is inadvertently hooked up to a surveillance feed, she and her friends witness a murder plan on the TV screen.
episodes.title: The Murder Channel

episodes.synopsis: Jessica comes to the aid of investigator Charlie Garrett, who's been accused by the police of murdering the wife of a client named Philip Sparling.
episodes.title: Fatal Paradise

episodes.synopsis: When the son of a winery matriarch is murdered alongside a rival vintner, Jessica discovers a plot to buy a competing winery may be the motive.
episodes.title: Crimson Harvest

episodes.synopsis: When the town bully and his mistress are murdered, Jessica discovers that members of the Cabot Cove bowling league may be involved in the killings.
episodes.title: Murder by Twos

episodes.synopsis: While taping an infomercial, Jessica and a panel of writers find themselves the subjects of a real-life whodunit when an audience member is murdered.
episodes.title: Murder of the Month Club

episodes.synopsis: Jessica meets a detective who's tracking a suspect connected to the theft of a gold Fabergé egg, and she lends him a hand with the investigation.
episodes.title: An Egg to Die For

episodes.synopsis: A dispute over a tree seems to be at the center of the murder of Seth's botanist cousin. Jessica travels to his deceased cousin's plantation to help.
episodes.title: The Scent of Murder

episodes.synopsis: On a trip to Cairo, Jessica comes to the aid of a friend and becomes involved in the smuggling of an Egyptian artifact when its theft leads to murder.
episodes.title: Death 'n Denial

episodes.synopsis: Jessica comes to the rescue of opera singer Andrea Beaumont when a stalker surfaces and threatens to kill Andrea before she ever reaches the stage.
episodes.title: Murder in High C

episodes.synopsis: Nobel Prize winner Dr. Max Franklin fakes his own death. When he's actually murdered, Jessica unearths a conspiracy involving the biophysicist's lab.
episodes.title: Twice Dead

episodes.synopsis: Before an unreleased film is premiered, a movie buff is murdered. Jessica discovers this is the second time a murder has blocked the movie's release.
episodes.title: Film Flam

episodes.synopsis: Jessica becomes embroiled in a murder mystery in the world of high fashion, where she discovers slave-labor sweatshops inside the fashion industry.
episodes.title: Murder a la Mode

episodes.synopsis: Jessica learns of a controversy surrounding a proposal to develop Cabot Cove. The controversy reaches its peak when a developer's wife turns up dead.
episodes.title: The Dream Team

episodes.synopsis: The death of a history professor is at first dismissed as a school prank gone wrong. But Jessica learns of an academic rivalry steeped in conspiracy.
episodes.title: School for Murder

episodes.synopsis: At a lodge in Ireland, a tourist is found dead. Jessica thinks the murder may be the work of a group pressuring the lodge owner to sell his land.
episodes.title: Another Killing In Cork

episodes.synopsis: When the domineering father of a tennis phenom turns up dead, many wonder if Louise simply met her breaking point. It's up to Jessica to find out.
episodes.title: Game, Set, Murder

episodes.synopsis: Jessica becomes suspicious when a prominent New York stylist's new salon is linked to an attempted murder, burglaries and a counterfeit antique coin.
episodes.title: Nailed

episodes.synopsis: Jessica enlists a private investigator to help uncover an insurance scam when her friend is accused of killing her estranged husband.
episodes.title: A Quaking in Aspen

episodes.synopsis: Jessica comes to the rescue when a truck-stop hold-up artist and a group of shifty fortune hunters terrorize a dusty little town in Arizona.
episodes.title: The Secret of Gila Junction

episodes.synopsis: Jessica's research in New Orleans is interrupted when a series of voodoo murders gets her attention, and she dives deep into the world of the occult.
episodes.title: Big Easy Murder

episodes.synopsis: Jessica's concern for her bedridden friend grows when a new nurse suspected of committing mercy killings begins working at the hospital.
episodes.title: Home Care

episodes.synopsis: Jessica travels to Ireland, where ghosts and antique smugglers interrupt her stay at a castle bed and breakfast.
episodes.title: Nan's Ghost (Part 1)

episodes.synopsis: Jessica must escape imprisonment in the dungeon of an Irish castle and get to the bottom of a missing-antiques puzzle and a mysterious murder.
episodes.title: Nan's Ghost (Part 2)

episodes.synopsis: With one her books being made into a movie in Rome, Jessica travels to the set. While she's there, a stuntman dies in a somewhat suspicious accident.
episodes.title: Shooting in Rome

episodes.synopsis: While bidding on a rare manuscript by Sir Arthur Conan Doyle, Jessica uncovers the murder of an art forger and helps Charlie Garrett out of trouble.
episodes.title: Deadly Bidding

episodes.synopsis: Jessica travels to an ice cream factory to pick up a check for charity. When she arrives, however, she discovers the money gone and an executive dead.
episodes.title: Frozen Stiff

episodes.synopsis: A prosecutor is murdered, and Jessica is called to testify before the jury when it's discovered that the deceased's last phone call was to her number.
episodes.title: Unwilling Witness

episodes.synopsis: Jessica's trip to Osaka is interrupted when a motorcycle racer's life is threatened because he intends to marry a girl from a traditional family.
episodes.title: Kendo Killing

episodes.synopsis: Jessica investigates when a Latin band on the verge of stardom is lured in by some shady characters.
episodes.title: Death Goes Double Platinum

episodes.synopsis: While rehearsing for a benefit concert, a singer is electrocuted by a guitar. Unfortunately, the musician's bad reputation makes for many suspects.
episodes.title: Murder in Tempo

episodes.synopsis: A manuscript in the works helps Jessica draw links between a murder, a suicide and a child's kidnapping.
episodes.title: The Dark Side of the Door

episodes.synopsis: Jessica hunts for the truth when hostility breaks out among the cast members of the new sitcom "Buds."
episodes.title: Murder Among Friends

episodes.synopsis: When Jessica's children's story inspires a puppet show, she discovers that one of the puppet stars has been used as a weapon in an unsolved murder.
episodes.title: Something Foul in Flappieville

episodes.synopsis: While vacationing at a lodge in the Grand Tetons, Jessica becomes embroiled in a squabble over a stolen diamond, blackmail and murder.
episodes.title: Track of a Soldier

episodes.synopsis: The owner of a run-down house Deputy Andy is buying turns up dead, and Andy becomes the prime suspect when the murder weapon is found in his car.
episodes.title: Evidence of Malice

episodes.synopsis: While on an engagement in Australia, Jessica discovers she's inherited 130,000 acres of land. The locals' anger over this leads to a pair of murders.
episodes.title: Southern Double-Cross

episodes.synopsis: Rivalry between two yachtsmen escalates when one is murdered two days before a big race and the other's daughter becomes the key suspect.
episodes.title: Race to Death

episodes.synopsis: Jessica is the only one who sees a connection between a motorcyclist's fatal accident and the seemingly unrelated murder of a wealthy attorney.
episodes.title: What You Don't Know Can Kill You

episodes.synopsis: Jessica becomes ensnared in international intrigue involving a stolen biological weapon and a covert arms deal.
episodes.title: Mrs. Parker's Revenge

episodes.synopsis: In her final case, Jessica investigates the murder of a San Francisco radio station owner whose new methods made him plenty of enemies.
episodes.title: Death by Demographics
